todos.content: Read the implementation plan from specs/issue-10-adw-def456-sdlc_planner-openapi-docs-and-mcp-support.md
Install dependencies: cd apps/packages/api && npm i @nestjs/swagger swagger-ui-express
Configure SwaggerModule in apps/packages/api/src/main.ts
Create DTOs: provider.dto.ts and proxy.dto.ts in apps/packages/api/src/dto/
Add Swagger decorators to providers.controller.ts
Add Swagger decorators to proxies.controller.ts
Add Swagger decorators to usage, notifications, and webhook controllers
Update README.md with OpenAPI and MCP docs
Run validation: install, build, start, test /api-docs
Run git diff --stat to report changes

tool_input.description: Add all OpenAPI changes to staging

tool_input.command:
git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat: implement OpenAPI docs and MCP support for API endpoints

Added @nestjs/swagger for auto-generated interactive docs at /api-docs. Created DTOs for validation/schemas, decorated all controllers with @ApiTags (including mcp-tool), @ApiOperation, queries/bodies/responses. Updated README with usage instructions and MCP integration notes. Ensures API consumable by Claude Code agents.

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
